hero.title: Crafting Digital Solutions
hero.subtitle: A collection of tools designed to simplify development workflows and enhance productivity

tools.title: My Tool Collection
tools.subtitle: Click on any tool to explore it

about.title: About The Developer
about.text1: I'm passionate about creating efficient, user-friendly tools that solve real problems. Each tool in my collection was built to address specific challenges I encountered in my development journey.
about.text2: My philosophy is simple: build tools that I would want to use myself, with clean interfaces and intuitive functionality.

footer.text: Quality tools for developers, by a developer.

copyright: Â© 2023 Designed and developed by DangVo. All rights reserved.

pdf.name: PDF Split/Merge
pdf.desc: Split or merge multiple PDF files into a single file.

qr.name: QR Code Generator
qr.desc: Generate QR codes for any URL or text.

stock.name: Stock Analysis & Prediction
stock.desc: Analyze and predict stock prices based on financial metrics and forecast the ex-dividend date.

mini_url_shortenner.name: Mini URL Shortener
mini_url_shortenner.desc: Shorten long URLs into a concise and memorable link.

url_shortenner.name: URL Shortener & QR Code
url_shortenner.desc: Shorten long URLs into a concise and memorable link. Generate QR codes for the shortened link. Manage your shortened links.

google_one_trick.name: Google One Trick
google_one_trick.desc: Helps you register for all Google One plans for free.

code_formatter.name: Code Formatter
code_formatter.desc: A powerful tool to format your code in multiple languages with customizable options.

api_tester.name: API Tester
api_tester.desc: Test your REST APIs with this intuitive interface that supports all HTTP methods.

color_palette.name: Color Palette Generator
color_palette.desc: Generate beautiful color palettes with perfect contrast ratios for your designs.

db_visualizer.name: Database Visualizer
db_visualizer.desc: Visualize your database schema and relationships in an interactive diagram.

markdown_editor.name: Markdown Editor
markdown_editor.desc: A live preview markdown editor with export to HTML and PDF functionality.

password_generator.name: Password Generator
password_generator.desc: Generate secure passwords with customizable length and character sets.

cv_online.name: Online CV Maker
cv_online.desc: Create professional resumes online with various templates.

platzi_fake_api.name: Platzi Fake Store API
platzi_fake_api.desc: A fake API for e-commerce products by Platzi.

software_testing_tools.name: Software Testing Tools & Resources
software_testing_tools.desc: A curated list of hand-picked software testing tools and resources.

sql_visualizer.name: SQL Visualizer
sql_visualizer.desc: Visualize your SQL queries as animated diagrams.

fake_store_api.name: Fake Store API
fake_store_api.desc: Free online REST API for fake data, great for testing and prototyping.

dangvo_docs.name: DangVo's Guides
dangvo_docs.desc: A collection of helpful guides and documents written by DangVo.

netflix_dangvo.name: DangVo's Online Movies
netflix_dangvo.desc: Watch movies online on DangVo's platform.

bbc_news.name: BBC News
bbc_news.desc: See the latest news from BBC for Vietnamese people not blocked.

kafe_stories.name: 9kafe - Good Stories
kafe_stories.desc: A repository of good stories and novels.

random_profile.name: Random Vietnamese Profile Generator
random_profile.desc: Generate random personal profiles for Vietnamese people.

edu_temp_mail.name: Educational Temporary Mail
edu_temp_mail.desc: Get a temporary email address with an educational domain.

online_alarm.name: Online Alarm Clock
online_alarm.desc: Set up an online alarm clock directly in your browser.

url_extractor.name: URL Extractor

temp_email_list.name: List of Temporary Email Websites
temp_email_list.desc: A curated list of reputable free temporary email providers.

sensitive_word_replacer.name: Sensitive Word Replacer for Facebook
sensitive_word_replacer.desc: Replace sensitive words when posting on Facebook.
